body.p: Similarly, if an entity uses a deemed cost in its opening IFRS statement of financial position for an investment in a subsidiary, joint venture or associate in its separate financial statements (see paragraph D15), the entity’s first IFRS separate financial statements shall disclose:

li.p: the aggregate deemed cost of those investments for which deemed cost is their previous GAAP carrying amount;
the aggregate deemed cost of those investments for which deemed cost is fair value; and
the aggregate adjustment to the carrying amounts reported under previous GAAP.
